column2: mutate(point_att = ifelse(fpl$was_home == "True" & (fpl$team_h_score > fpl$team_a_score), 2, ifelse(fpl$was_home == "True" & (fpl$team_h_score == fpl$team_a_score),1,ifelse(fpl$was_home == "False" & (fpl$team_h_score < fpl$team_a_score),2.5,ifelse(fpl$was_home == "False" & (fpl$team_h_score == fpl$team_a_score),1.5, 0))))
